ovdesc.p: Bank Conditions or Correspondent bank conditions, define the way in which a payment should be processed in the payment engine for a
correspondent bank. Bank conditions of the correspondent bank involved in the payment will influence mainly Straight through processing of the
payment in the payment engine. This will also allow customising banks’ charge account, statements and advices.

The Bank conditions component allows the behaviour of the payment engine to configure at a flexible level where debit or credit party (or both parties) in the payment is a bank. Similar flexibility is provided by the client condition component where one side of the payment or both involves the customer and is used to control the customer processing conditions. Bank and Client conditions are handled by separate components due to the different criteria (input and output parameters) required for banks and customers.
